title: Halo
lyrics:
[intro]
(G)  (Am)  (Em)  (C)
(G)  (Am)  (Em)  (C)
 
(G) Remember those walls I (Am)built, well baby they're tumbling (Em)down
And they didn't even put up a (C)fight, they didn't even make a (G)sound
I found a way to let you (Am)in, but I never really had a (Em)doubt
Standing in the light of your (C)halo, I got my angel (G)now
 
It's like I've been awa(Am)kened, every rule I had you brea(Em)kin'
It's the risk that I'm ta(C)kin', I ain't never gonna shut you (G)out
 
[pre-chorus]
Everywhere I'm looking (Am)now, I'm surrounded by your em(Em)brace
Baby I can see your (C)halo, you know you're my saving (G)grace
You're everything I need and (Am)more, it's written all over your (Em)face
Baby I can feel your (C)halo, pray it won't fade (G)away
 
[chorus]
I can feel your halo (halo) halo
I can feel your (Am)halo (halo) halo
I can see your (Em)halo (halo) halo
I can feel your (C)halo (halo) halo
(G) Woah…
 
Hit me like a ray of (Am)sun, burning through my darkest (Em)night
You're the only one that I (C)want, think I'm addicted to your (G)light
I swore I'd never fall (Am)again, but this don't even feel like (Em)falling
Gravity can't for(C)get, to pull me to the (G)ground again
 
Feels like I've been awa(Am)kened, every rule I had you brea(Em)kin'
The risk that I'm ta(C)kin', I’m never gonna shut you (G)out
 
[pre-chorus]
Everywhere I'm looking (Am)now, I'm surrounded by your em(Em)brace
Baby I can see your (C)halo, you know you're my saving (G)grace
You're everything I need and (Am)more, it's written all over your (Em)face
Baby I can feel your (C)halo, pray it won't fade (G)away
 
[chorus]
I can feel your halo (halo) halo
I can feel your (Am)halo (halo) halo
I can see your (Em)halo (halo) halo
I can feel your (C)halo (halo) halo
(G) Woah…
(Am) Halooooo (Em) ouuuu
(C) Halooooo (G)ouuuu  
(Am) Ouuuu (Em)ouuuuu (C)ouuuuu
 
[pre-chorus]
Everywhere I'm looking (Am)now, I'm surrounded by your em(Em)brace
Baby I can see your (C)halo, you know you're my saving (G)grace
You're everything I need and (Am)more, it's written all over your (Em)face
Baby I can feel your (C)halo, pray it won't fade (G)away
 
[chorus]
I can feel your halo (halo) halo
I can feel your (Am)halo (halo) halo
I can see your (Em)halo (halo) halo
I can feel your (C)halo (halo) halo
I can see your (G) halo (halo) halo
I can feel your (Am) halo (halo) halo
I can see your (Em) halo (halo) halo
I can feel your (C) halo (halo) halo
(G) Woah… [end]
